title: RO CEO on The Rise of GLP-1 Drugs
description: Zach Reitano, CEO of RO, says demand for the company’s pill has far exceeded expectations. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that the oral medication is more approachable and affordable, noting the price has dropped from about $1,300 eight months ago to a starting price of $149. (Source: Bloomberg)
